title: With Promise of Legalization, Psychedelic Companies Joust Over Future Profits
description: Cash rich start-ups are filing scores of patent claims on hallucinogens like magic mushrooms. Researchers and patient advocates worry high prices will make the therapies unaffordable.
dc:creator: Andrew Jacobs
media:credit: Tom Jamieson for The New York Times
media:description: George Goldsmith, co-founder and executive chairman of Compass Pathways in London.
